title: About
text:
Self-introduction
Hello, My name is Meihan, you can call me Cathy as well. I am currently a year 2 students major in Communications and new media at University of Singapore. I love eating, sleeping and watching movies.

title: Final Project
text:
summer_data <- read.csv("/Users/shuil/Desktop/NM2207/project_data/june.csv")

winter_data <- read.csv("/Users/shuil/Desktop/NM2207/project_data/dec.csv")


library(tidyverse)

── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.1
✔ ggplot2   3.4.4     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
✔ lubridate 1.9.3     ✔ tidyr     1.3.0
✔ purrr     1.0.2     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
